post.title: Goodbye my Friend..
post.body:
Happens to loose a friend, a very good one

and people try to get you up but.....
<iframe width="560" height="315" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/h0BkacsIKQE" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen></iframe>

_MISAKI PROJECT - Blooming Flower (OFFICIAL VIDEO)_

post.title: Empty Room
post.body:
Emotions exist everywhere... Even in an empty room!
Silent doesn't exist... not when there's at least a person in the room...
Because an heartbeat.. is a beat!
<iframe width="560" height="315" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/2eGF66HZXmE" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen></iframe>
### [watch me](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=2eGF66HZXmE)
>Let me inspire you by sharing this vEmoLink:
_Stay With Me (Sam Smith looping KOver)_

post.title: Coincidences
post.body:
Do You Believe in... _Coincidences_? : )
If something apparently impossible happens.. there must be a reason!
Don't You agree? :]

post.body:

where the problem of human extinction is not longer a problem..

post.title: The Lawn Mower
post.body:
E.thing is running too fast around You!
